{"rule":"TOO_LONG_SENTENCE","sentence":"^\\QThis label either: repeats one of the \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q obligatory labels in which case \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q is adjacent to two of its faces, or it is opposite to one of the obligatory labels in which case we have a complimentary edge, or it is yet another number not in the \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q obligatory labels, in which case the neighbours of \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q are its completely labelled face and one adjacent simplex of larger dimension determined by the extra label.\\E$"}
